title: Radhai Manathil Lyrics Snegithiye
stanzas: <div>Raadhai Manathil Lyrics Snegithiye

Raadhai manathil
raadhai manthil
enna ragasiyamo
kan rendum thandhi adikkika
kannaa vaa kandu pidikka(2)

kollai nilavadikkum
vellai raathiriyil
kothai raadhai nadanthaal

moongil kaattil
oru gaanam kasinthavudam
moochu vaangi uraindhaal.

paadal vandha vazhi
aadai paranthathaiyum
paavai marandhu tholaithaal.

nenjai moodikolla
aadai thaevai endru
nilavin oliyai iluththaal.

nenjin oasai odunjivittaal
nizhalai kandu nadungi vittaal
kannan thaedi vandha magal
thanni tholaithu mayangivittaal

thaan irukkindra idaththinil
irudhayam kaanavillai
engae engae sol sol.

kan rendum thandhi adikkika
kannaa vaa kandu pidikka

Raadhai manathil
raadhai manthil
enna ragasiyamo
kan rendum thandhi adikkika
kannaa vaa kandu pidikka

kannan oodhum kuzhal
kaatril thoongivittu
kaantham pola ilukkum.

mangai vandhavudan
maraindhu kolluvadhu
maaya kannan vazhakkam

kaadu irunduvida
kangal sivandhuvida
kathal radhai alaindhaal

avanai thaedi aval
thannai tholaithu vittu
aasai noyil vilundhaal

udhadu thudikkum paechu illai
uyirum irukkum moochu illai
vandha paathai ninaivu illai
pogum paathai puriyavillai

un puzhaanguzhal saththam
paedhai radhai jeevan kolval
kannaa ingae nee vaa vaa

kanneeril uyir thudikka
kannaa vaa uyir kodukka.

Raadhai manathil
raadhai manthil
enna ragasiyamo
kan rendum thandhi adikkika
kannaa vaa kandu pidikka

kannam theendiyadhu
kannan endru andha
kanni kangal vizhithaal

kannam theendiyadhu
kannan alla verum
kaatru endru thigaithaal.

kangal moodi kondu
kannan paerai solli
kaigal neetti azhaithaal.

kaattill tholaithuvitta
kannin neer thuliyai
ingu kandu pidithaal

kiliyin siragai vaangikondu
kizhakku nokki siragadithaal
kuyilin kuralai vaangi kondu
koovi koovi aval azhaithaal

aval kurai uyir karaiyumun
udal mannil sariyumun
kannaa kannaa nee vaa

kanneeril uyir thudikka
kannaa vaa uyir kodukka.
